# 68. ✅ Add support for EVM on MegaETH, Cronos; upgrade DlnSource to 1.7.1; whitelist several routers

Date of creation: 28.11.2025

#### Add Support for EVM on MegaETH, Cronos to deBridgeGate

Interact with: 0x43dE2d77BF8027e25dBD179B491e8d64f38398aA

BASE Interact with: 0xc1656B63D9EEBa6d114f6bE19565177893e5bCBF

```
 setChainSupport(uint256 _chainId, bool _isSupported, bool _isChainFrom) 
_chainId 100000031
_isSupported 1
_isChainFrom 1

 setChainSupport(uint256 _chainId, bool _isSupported, bool _isChainFrom) 
_chainId 100000031
_isSupported 1
_isChainFrom 0

setChainSupport(uint256 _chainId, bool _isSupported, bool _isChainFrom) 
_chainId 100000019
_isSupported 1
_isChainFrom 1

setChainSupport(uint256 _chainId, bool _isSupported, bool _isChainFrom) 
_chainId 100000019
_isSupported 1
_isChainFrom 0
```

####  Add Support for EVM on MegaETH, Cronos to DLN

MegaETH, Cronos has deployed contract:
DlnSource: '0xeF4fB24aD0916217251F553c0596F8Edc630EB66',
DlnDestination: '0xE7351Fd770A37282b91D153Ee690B63579D6dd7f',

```
DlnDestination: 0xE7351Fd770A37282b91D153Ee690B63579D6dd7f
setDlnSourceAddress(uint256 _chainIdFrom, bytes memory _dlnSourceAddress, ChainEngine _chainEngine)
chainId 100000031
_dlnSourceAddress 0xeF4fB24aD0916217251F553c0596F8Edc630EB66
chainEngine :1 EVM_TYPE

setDlnSourceAddress(uint256 _chainIdFrom, bytes memory _dlnSourceAddress, ChainEngine _chainEngine)
chainId 100000019
_dlnSourceAddress 0xeF4fB24aD0916217251F553c0596F8Edc630EB66
chainEngine :1 EVM_TYPE
```

```
DlnSource: 0xeF4fB24aD0916217251F553c0596F8Edc630EB66
setDlnDestinationAddress(uint256 _chainIdTo, bytes memory _dlnDestinationAddress,  ChainEngine _chainEngine)
_chainIdTo 100000031
_dlnDestinationAddress 0xE7351Fd770A37282b91D153Ee690B63579D6dd7f
chainEngine :1 EVM_TYPE

setDlnDestinationAddress(uint256 _chainIdTo, bytes memory _dlnDestinationAddress,  ChainEngine _chainEngine)
_chainIdTo 100000019
_dlnDestinationAddress 0xE7351Fd770A37282b91D153Ee690B63579D6dd7f
chainEngine :1 EVM_TYPE
```


#### WhiteList Routers

Interact with:  0x663DC15D3C1aC63ff12E45Ab68FeA3F0a883C251

```
 function updateSupportedRouter(
        address _srcSwapRouter,
        bool _isSupported
    ) 
    
  function updateAllowanceAggregator(
        address _router,
        address _allowanceAggregator
    )  
```


- Ethereum
   - FLY router 0xa6e941eab67569ca4522f70d343714ff51d571c4

#### Upgrade DlnSource to 1.7.1

DlnSource (core contract – highest importance, low complexity change)   
This upgrade is largely housekeeping. It adds a dedicated custom-accessed order placement method with custom fee schedule, which is a part of our ongoing effort towards gasless and AA-enabled protocol we are currently building.

New implementation is 0x322B481088143d9Ff74e4169Fb7f12F7808690DF
- ethereum 0x322B481088143d9Ff74e4169Fb7f12F7808690DF
- bnb 0x322B481088143d9Ff74e4169Fb7f12F7808690DF
- polygon 0x322B481088143d9Ff74e4169Fb7f12F7808690DF
- arbitrumOne 0x322B481088143d9Ff74e4169Fb7f12F7808690DF
- avalanche 0x322B481088143d9Ff74e4169Fb7f12F7808690DF
- linea 0x322B481088143d9Ff74e4169Fb7f12F7808690DF
- base 0x322B481088143d9Ff74e4169Fb7f12F7808690DF
- optimism 0x322B481088143d9Ff74e4169Fb7f12F7808690DF
